fields.text: If everything was easy you'd be bored. 🥱
This is your Daily Reminder: you've got this, you're gonna kill it and have the best day! 🤩
We are all works in progress. 🌱
Even when it’s grey outside there’s blue beyond the clouds. ⛅️
Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you. ☀️
Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible. 🥅
If you can stay positive in a negative situation, you win. ✨
Try to be a rainbow in someone’s cloud. 🌈
No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted. 🌻
Today is a good day to try. 🪴
